column4: anyone knows of an  mp3 player app  like amarok but for GNOME, i want to be able to create playlists and burn them and with a nice GUI like amarok but I want the app for GNOME
it works with both it's just that in gnome you get all the kdelibs that you might not want
yes!!!!!!!! that looks exactly like what I want, im going to take a look at it, thanks!
